welcome_message_body: Welcome to beautiful Kaihua, China, known for its stunning natural landscapes and rich cultural heritage. We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to explore all the charm this city has to offer.

restaurants.name: 南得一臭
restaurants.description: 南得一臭 is a yunnan restaurant located in 文山.
restaurants.address: 普阳西路10号, 文山, 云南

restaurants.description: McDonald's (麦当劳) is a fast food restaurant located in the city.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Puzhehei Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for domestic flights only.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
